get_user ( $  Login  ) 

Function returns user by it's login.

$Login -Login of the searching user.
Returns:
User object.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 259 of file user_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( isset( $this->UsersCache[ $Login ] ) )
                        {
                              return( $this->UsersCache[ $Login ] );
                        }
                        
                        $Login = $this->Security->get( $Login , 'command' );
                        
                        $Users = $this->unsafe_select( "login LIKE '$Login'" );
                        
                        if( count( $Users ) === 0 || count( $Users ) > 1 )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( 'User with login '.$Login.' was not found' ) );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->UsersCache[ $Login ] = $Users[ 0 ];
                              return( $Users[ 0 ] );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

register_user ( $  Login,
$  Password,
$  Email,
$  Name,
$  Sex,
$  Site,
$  About 
)

Function registers new user. Right after ergistration user is not active. It can be activated by function call activate_user().

Parameters:
$Login - login of the deleting user.
$Password - Inputed password.
$Email - e-mail address of the ergistred user.
$Name - Name.
$Sex - Sex.
$Site - User site.
$About - Information about user.
Returns:
md5 hash of activation.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 654 of file user_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Login = $this->Security->get( $Login , 'command' );
                        $Password = $this->Security->get( $Password , 'string' );
                        $Email = $this->Security->get( $Email , 'email' );
                        $Name = $this->Security->get( $Name , 'string' );
                        $Sex = $this->Security->get( $Sex , 'integer' );
                        $Site = $this->Security->get( $Site , 'string' );
                        $About = $this->Security->get( $About , 'string' );
                        
                        if( $Sex != 1 && $Sex != 2 )
                        {
                              $Sex = 0;
                        }
                        
                        $Hash = md5( microtime() );

                        $this->Database->lock( array( $this->NativeTable ) , array( 'WRITE' ) );
                        
                        $this->Database->insert( 
                              $this->NativeTable , 
                              "login , password , email , name , sex , active , registered , site , about" , 
                              "'$Login' , md5( '$Password' ) , '$Email' , '$Name' , $Sex , '$Hash' , NOW() , '$Site' , '$About'"
                        );
                        $this->Database->commit();
                        
                        $id = $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , '1 = 1 ORDER by id DESC LIMIT 0 , 1' );
                        $id = get_field( $id[ 0 ] , 'id' );
                        
                        $this->Database->unlock();
                        
                        $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_user' , array( 'login' => $Login , 'id' => $id ) );
                        
                        $EventManager->trigger_event( 'anonimous' , array( 'master_id' => $id , 'master_type' => 'user' ) );
                        
                        return( $Hash );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Records = $this->unsafe_select( '1 = 1' );
                        
                        foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
                        {
                              if( $v->id )
                              {
                                    $Records[ $k ]->title = $v->login;
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Records[ $k ]->title = '{lang:not_defined}';
                              }
                        }
                        
                        return( $Records );
                  }

update ( $  id,
$  Record 
)

Updating record.

Parameters:
$id - Comma separated list of record's id.
$Record - Example for update.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 444 of file user_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
                        $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
                              $Record , 
                              'password:string;email:email;active:command;active_to:string;'.
                                    'banned_to:string;name:string;sex:integer;site:string;about:string' , 
                              'allow_not_set'
                        );

                        $Fields = array();
                        $Values = array();
                        
                        foreach( $Record as $f => $v )
                        {
                              if( $f == 'sex' )
                              {
                                    if( $v != 1 && $v != 2 )
                                    {
                                          $v = 0;
                                    }
                                    $Fields [] = $f;
                                    $Values [] = $v;
                              }
                              if( $f == 'active' )
                              {
                                    if( $v == 'on' )
                                    {
                                          $Fields [] = $f;
                                          $Values [] = "'active'";
                                    }
                                    if( $v == 'deactivate' )
                                    {
                                          $Fields [] = $f;
                                          $Values [] = "'".md5( microtime() )."'";
                                    }
                                    continue;
                              }
                              if( $f == 'password' )
                              {
                                    if( $v == '' )
                                    {
                                          /* nop */
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Fields [] = $f;
                                          $Values [] = "'".md5( $v )."'";
                                    }
                                    continue;
                              }
                              if( $v !== '_no_update' )
                              {
                                    $Fields [] = $f;
                                    if( is_integer( $v ) )
                                    {
                                          $Values [] = $v;
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Values [] = "'".$v."'";
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( count( $Fields ) )
                        {
                              $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $this->Database->update( 
                                    $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
                              );
                              $this->Database->commit();
                              
                              $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_update_user' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
                              
                              $EventManager->trigger_event( 'anonimous' , array( 'master_id' => $id , 'master_type' => 'user' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

update_user ( $  Login,
$  Email,
$  Site,
$  About 
)

Function updates user info.

Parameters:
$Login - login (login cann not be changed).
$Email - new email.
$Site - User site.
$About - Information about user.
Note:
Password can not be reset by this function. To do this use reset_password function.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 825 of file user_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Login = $this->Security->get( $Login , 'command' );
                        $Email = $this->Security->get( $Email , 'email' );
                        $Site = $this->Security->get( $Site , 'string' );
                        $About = $this->Security->get( $About , 'string' );
                        
                        $this->Database->update( 
                              $this->NativeTable , 
                              array( 'email' , 'site' , 'about' ) , 
                              array( "'$Email'" , "'$Site'" , "'$About'" ) , 
                              "login LIKE '$Login'"
                        );
                        $this->Database->commit();
                        
                        $Users = $this->unsafe_select( "login LIKE '$Login'" );
                        $User = $Users[ 0 ];
                        $id = get_field( $User , 'id' );
                        
                        $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_update_user' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
                        
                        $EventManager->trigger_event( 'anonimous' , array( 'master_id' => $id , 'master_type' => 'user' ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

validate_auth ( $  Login,
$  Password,
$  HashPassed = false 
)

Function validates login and password.

Parameters:
$Login - Inputed login.
$Password - Inputed password.
$HashPassed - true if md5 hash of the password was put in $Password.
Returns:
false if login and password validation was passed.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 318 of file user_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Login = $this->Security->get( $Login , 'command' );
                        $Password = $this->Security->get( $Password , 'string' );
                        
                        $User = $this->get_user( $Login );
                        
                        if( $HashPassed )
                        {
                              return( $Password == get_field( $User , 'password' ) );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              return( md5( $Password ) == get_field( $User , 'password' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
